function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Balconies as places for communication and social activities may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases between neighbors and residents.","Impact":"Unmitigated spread of contagious diseases can lead to increased illness and transmission rates within the community.","Mitigation":"Implementing guidelines for social distancing and hygiene practices in balcony usage. Encouraging the use of masks and limiting the number of people gathering on balconies.","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Residents, neighbors, and visitors in the apartment building","Owner":"Apartment management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Balconies as areas for observation and leisure activities can lead to close proximity and interaction between individuals, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Unregulated use of balconies for leisure and socializing can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases within the building.","Mitigation":"Enforcing policies on balcony usage, promoting awareness of the risks of close interaction, and encouraging responsible behavior on balconies.","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Residents, neighbors, and visitors in the apartment building","Owner":"Apartment management, community organizations"},{"Description":"Use of balconies for daily activities like drying laundry and storing items can potentially spread contaminants or pathogens in the air or on surfaces.","Impact":"Unhygienic balcony practices can pose a risk of contamination and contribute to the spread of infectious agents within the building.","Mitigation":"Educating residents on proper hygiene and maintenance of balconies, implementing guidelines for cleanliness and safe storage practices on balconies.","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Residents of the apartment building","Owner":"Apartment management"}]}
